[docs]def is_stock(sid):
    market, ticker = sid[:2], sid[2:8]
    return (market == 'SH' and ticker[:2] == '60') or \
           (market == 'SZ' and ticker[:2] == '30') or \
           (market == 'SZ' and ticker[:2] == '00')
